name: Geoxplosion!
description:
Are you ready to witness to massive explosions? We created a minimalistic top-down  that makes you kill the hell outta juicy shapes! 

Your every action causes a secondary ability: 

Dashing causes you to drop a bomb that explodes in seconds! Careful! I wouldn't recommend to stay near of it!

Your companion loves synergy! Move as you can to make her shoot! Or they will.

How long are you gonna survive?

How to play?

WASD - Move

Space - Dash

Q - Change Weapon

Created for Jamination 5 with love <3
